data.title: Infotainment System and Connected Services
data.meta_description: Compare Uconnect® systems available in Jeep vehicles. Explore voice commands, phone connectivity, navigation & more. Find how-to instructions and FAQs.
data.text:
Whether you’re in the driver seat of your vehicle or in the comfort of your home, Uconnect® lets you stay connected and in control with available Jeep® Connect . With the Uconnect 5 infotainment system and Jeep app , you can access features ranging from safety and security to available navigation straight from your vehicle or smartphone, providing the personalized benefits you deserve in your connected world.

Going off-road? Stay on top of your vehicle’s performance with Jeep® Off-Road Pages. Track your vehicle’s off-road performance and receive real-time information including ride height, pitch and more.

The available Jeep® Wi-Fi built-in hotspot delivers fast, reliable 4G Wi-Fi® using your vehicle’s antenna. Connect up to eight devices, up to 50 feet away. Stream, browse, download and share for just a low monthly fee and take your Wi-Fi on the road.
